content:
Tula bakes cookies before hanging out with her friends every week.

She recorded the amount of sugar she uses (in grams) and how many cookies she made for five different batches.
  
|||||
:-- | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: | --:
**Sugar (g)** | $350$ | $200$ | $175$ | $300$ | $225$
**Cookies** | $26$ | $19$ | $15$ | $25$ | $16$ 
  
**Plot the data in a scatterplot.**
